description:
★ Feminine Reptiles ★| November 2022 ★ 𝓑𝓪𝓼e

Unlock this and more bases for less $$$ joining to my Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/niinaxan?filters[tag]=Bases

https://www.patreon.com/niinaxan

Base made for YCHS, Adoptables, Commissions and personal use!♥

With 30+ layers of items!! For Reptiles, dragons, lizzards...

PSD AND PNG FILES, for mobile users and PC users!

  RULES 

  • You can edit the base.
  • Credit me if you use it.
  • YOU ARE ALLOWED TO do Adopts, Commissions and YCH COMMISSIONS!
  • Adopts and ychs can't be less than 5$ each! (you need to charge more than 5$ for your time and effort please!!!) ♥
  • DO NOT DELETE THE WATERMARK! Add yours too for the colors and edits on the base.
  • You can NOT re-sell the base!
  • Have fun!

EXTRA INFO: If you take commissions with this base please credit me. (NEVER REMOVE THE WATERMARK IN THE TOP LAYERS add yours with mine!).

You are not allowed to do extensions with this base.

This is the version 1.0 of the reptiles base, if you want anything to be added comment bellow for the version 2.0 or the next extension!
